mapper.select: select `id`,`types_awards`,`ass_oil_award_get_infocol`,`name_award`,`issuing_unit`,`time_issue`,`pro_id`,`task_id`,`apply_id`,`opt_uid`,`created`,`updated`, apply_info_id from ass_oil_award_get_info where id = #{value}

select `id`,`types_awards`,`ass_oil_award_get_infocol`,`name_award`,`issuing_unit`,`time_issue`,`pro_id`,`task_id`,`apply_id`,`opt_uid`,`created`,`updated`, apply_info_id from ass_oil_award_get_info where pro_id = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into ass_oil_award_get_info ( `types_awards`, `ass_oil_award_get_infocol`, `name_award`, `issuing_unit`, `time_issue`, `pro_id`, `task_id`, `apply_id`, `opt_uid`, `created`, `updated`, apply_info_id ) values ( #{typesAwards}, #{assOilAwardGetInfocol}, #{nameAward}, #{issuingUnit}, #{timeIssue}, #{proId}, #{taskId}, #{applyId}, #{optUid}, now(), #{updated}, #{applyInfoId} )
mapper.delete:
delete from ass_oil_award_get_info where id in
#{id}
